bulkLoadInsert.command: insert into sales_fact (product_id, customer_id, employee_id, supplier_id, sales_channel_id, promotion_id, booking_date_id, sales_date_id, delivery_date_id, priceBeforeDiscount, priceAfterDiscount, saleCosts) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into date_dim(date_id, dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values (date_dim_seq.nextval, '${salesDate}', TO_DATE('${salesDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY'), EXTRACT(DAY FROM TO_DATE('${salesDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE('${salesDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE('${salesDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')))
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select date_id from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${salesDate}'

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into date_dim(date_id, dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values (date_dim_seq.nextval, '${deliveryDate}', TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY'), EXTRACT(DAY FROM TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE('${deliveryDate}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')))
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select date_id from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${deliveryDate}'

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into date_dim(date_id, dateMMDDYYYY, date_val, day_of_week, month_num, year_num) values (date_dim_seq.nextval, '${dateMMDDYYYY}', TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', 'MM/DD/YYYY'), EXTRACT(DAY FROM TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE('${dateMMDDYYYY}', 'MM/DD/YYYY')))
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select date_id from date_dim where dateMMDDYYYY='${dateMMDDYYYY}'

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into employee_dim(employee_id, employee_name, employee_number) values (employee_dim_seq.nextval, '${employeeName}', ${employeeNumber})
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select employee_id from employee_dim where employee_name='${employeeName}' and employee_number=${employeeNumber}
sqlStatements.preCacheRecords: select employee_id, employee_name, employee_number from employee_dim

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into customer_dim(customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, customer_country, customer_phone) values (customer_dim_seq.nextval, '${customerName}','${customerAddress}','${customerCountry}','${customerPhone}')
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select customer_id from customer_dim where customer_name='${customerName}' and customer_address='${customerAddress}' and customer_country='${customerCountry}' and customer_phone='${customerPhone}'
sqlStatements.preCacheRecords: select customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, customer_country, customer_phone from customer_dim

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into product_dim(product_id, product_name, product_model, product_category, product_cost) values (product_dim_seq.nextval, '${productName}', '${productModel}', '${productCategory}', '${productCost}')
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select product_id from product_dim where product_name='${productName}' and product_model='${productModel}' and product_category='${productCategory}' and product_cost='${productCost}'
sqlStatements.preCacheRecords: select product_id, product_name, product_model, product_category, product_cost from product_dim

sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select supplier_id from supplier_dim where supplier_name='${supplierName}'
select sales_channel_id from sales_channel_dim where sales_channel_name='${salesChannelName}'

sqlStatements.insertSingleRecord: insert into promotion_dim(promotion_id, promotion_name, discount_pct) values (promotion_dim_seq.nextval, '${promotionName}', ${discountPCT})
sqlStatements.selectRecordIdentifier: select promotion_id from promotion_dim where promotion_name='${promotionName}' and discount_pct=${discountPCT}
sqlStatements.preCacheRecords: select promotion_id, promotion_name, discount_pct from promotion_dim
